name: Pritish Patil
body:
### About Me
I am an undergrad at IISc Bangalore. I am interested in modeling in biological sciences, especially neuroscience. Currently I am working on such a project with [Dr. Upi Bhalla](https://www.ncbs.res.in/bhalla) at NCBS.

My CV can be found [here](https://github.com/iampritishpatil/CV/raw/master/CV_short.pdf)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
